text: @Yamiche Headline: Trump was afraid of losing votes so he let you die. Trump didn take necessary precautions against covid19 because he thought it would damage election results. now Trump's using CV19 to bolster & brag about his Nielsen ratings during a pandemic. Trump's using death as PR
